Package Controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomerController
public class CustomerController extends Object
A class of CRUD operations on the Customer.dat file Calls RWController to read and write data into .dat file
Since:
2022-11-01
Version:
1.0

    • readUserList

      public static void readUserList() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Thiss method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfCustomers Arraylist. THIS READ FUNCTION HAS TO BE USED EVERYTIME THE PROGRAMME STARTS
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • updateCustomerList

      public static void updateCustomerList() throws IOException
      This method updates/overwrites the Customer.dat file with listOfCustomers Arraylist.
      Throws:
      IOException
